fields.name: abilityName
fields.description: Ability name - displayed in-game, potentially with $A special char codes

fields.name: uses
fields.description: Uses - or zero for infinite uses

fields.name: cost
fields.description: Cost - or zero for unsellable, halved for resale rate

fields.name: anim
fields.description: Animation - graphical effect that plays when this item is used in battle

fields.name: equip
fields.description: Equipment types - characters can't equip two items that share a flag

fields.name: warhead
fields.description: Effect - what happens when this applies

fields.name: tier
fields.description: Tier - mostly cosmetic, but can be used to autogenerate robostats

fields.name: robostats
fields.description: Robo stats - these boosts are granted to robots that equip this

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
